full_summary:
=================================
### Tender Title
Barracuda Networks or Equivalent for Department of National Defence

### Tender Reference Number
SSC-23-00024151:T

### Solicitation Number
BPM019793/24151

### Solicitation Type
Request for Proposal (RFP)

### Procurement Method
Competitive Open Bidding

### Contracting Entity
Shared Services Canada (SSC)

### Regions of Opportunity
Canada, excluding Canada National Capital Region

### Regions of Delivery
Ontario, excluding Canada National Capital Region

### Notice Information
Tender Notice Publication Date: October 16, 2023
Tender Closing Date: October 31, 2023, 00:00:00

### Contact Information
Chantal Deland, SSC P2P Portal
Phone: 343-551-7304
Email: [chantal.deland@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:chantal.deland@ssc-spc.gc.ca)

### Tender Description
Barracuda Networks or equivalent is sought by the Department of National Defence for implementation. Bidders can register in the SSC P2P portal to view and submit responses to solicitations, receive updates and amendments, and submit invoices.

**Important Amendment**: 
Amendment 002 has corrected the title of the RFQ and addresses additional questions from suppliers.

### Attachments
* Amendment 002 [Link](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/D8D9FAE8-6E20-425E-9276-F14F2440FAF0)
* Amendment 001 [Link](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/E0CDBBD7-D23E-40D0-AAB1-D8F36EA398B7)

 
Note:

* The renovation document sent is title remains the same.
* The end-of-solicited notice is for insiders.
* A closed countdown notification during this time to monetize, marked as non-applicable in the registry today.
